attributes.action: Force retailers to prevent panic buying during a national crisis by rationing
attributes.background: Panic buying can be a self fulfilling prophecy, as people buy in panic, to avoid missing out when others panic buy. Retailers could stop this if they limit sales to x/customer,  legislate so government can trigger this action in times of crisis.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300766

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
